languages.text: {n}Он поднимается из кресла и подходит к вам, чтобы обнять.{/n} "Иногда я молчу для того, чтобы не причинить боль. Если вещи, которые каждый понимает, но не решается произнести в слух".

traits.locale_text: {n}Он поднимается из кресла и подходит к вам, чтобы обнять.{/n} "Иногда я молчу для того, чтобы не причинить боль. Если вещи, которые каждый понимает, но не решается произнести в слух. Я... нахожу этот метод наилучшим".

languages.text: {n}He rises from his seat and comes over to take you in his arms.{/n} "Sometimes I stay silent to avoid causing pain. When things are self-evident, but I can't bring myself to say them aloud."
languages.original_text: {n}Он поднимается из кресла и подходит к вам, чтобы обнять.{/n} "Иногда я молчу для того, чтобы не причинить боль. Если вещи, которые каждый понимает, но не решается произнести в слух".

traits.locale_text: {n}He rises from his seat and comes over to take you in his arms.{/n} "Sometimes I stay silent to avoid causing pain. When things are self-evident, but I can't bring myself to say them aloud."
{n}He rises from his seat and comes over to take you in his arms.{/n} "Sometimes I stay silent to avoid causing pain. When things are self-evident, but I can't bring myself to say them aloud."
{n}He rises from his seat and comes over to take you in his arms.{/n} "Sometimes I stay silent to avoid causing pain. When things are self-evident, but I can't bring myself to say them aloud."
{n}He rises from his seat and comes over to take you in his arms.{/n} "Sometimes I stay silent to avoid causing pain. When things are self-evident, but I can't bring myself to say them aloud."

languages.text: {n}他从座位上站起身来，把你拥入怀中。{/n}“有时候我保持沉默，是为了避免造成痛苦。有些事情不言而喻，我没办法把它们大声说出来。”
languages.original_text: {n}He rises from his seat and comes over to take you in his arms.{/n} "Sometimes I stay silent to avoid causing pain. When things are self-evident, but I can't bring myself to say them aloud."

traits.locale_text: {n}他从座位上站起身来，把你拥入怀中。{/n}“有时候我保持沉默，是为了避免造成痛苦。有些事情不言而喻，我没办法把它们大声说出来。”

languages.text: {n}Se levanta de su asiento para abrazarte.{/n} «A veces guardo silencio para evitar causar daño. Cuando algo es evidente, pero no me atrevo a decirlo en voz alta».
languages.original_text: {n}He rises from his seat and comes over to take you in his arms.{/n} "Sometimes I stay silent to avoid causing pain. When things are self-evident, but I can't bring myself to say them aloud."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se levanta de su asiento para abrazarte.{/n} «A veces guardo silencio para evitar causar daño. Cuando algo es evidente, pero no me atrevo a decirlo en voz alta».

languages.text: {n}彼は席を立ち、あなたを抱きしめようとする。{/n}「時には、痛みを避けるために黙っていることもある。物事が自明であるにもかかわらず、それを声に出して言う気になれないときもある」
languages.original_text: {n}He rises from his seat and comes over to take you in his arms.{/n} "Sometimes I stay silent to avoid causing pain. When things are self-evident, but I can't bring myself to say them aloud."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は席を立ち、あなたを抱きしめようとする。{/n}「時には、痛みを避けるために黙っていることもある。物事が自明であるにもかかわらず、それを声に出して言う気になれないときもある」

languages.text: {n}Il se lève et s'approche pour vous prendre dans ses bras.{/n} « Oui, parfois, je préfère me taire plutôt que de faire souffrir. Il y a des choses que je ne peux me résoudre à dire à voix haute, même lorsqu'elles sont l'évidence même. »
languages.original_text: {n}He rises from his seat and comes over to take you in his arms.{/n} "Sometimes I stay silent to avoid causing pain. When things are self-evident, but I can't bring myself to say them aloud."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il se lève et s'approche pour vous prendre dans ses bras.{/n} « Oui, parfois, je préfère me taire plutôt que de faire souffrir. Il y a des choses que je ne peux me résoudre à dire à voix haute, même lorsqu'elles sont l'évidence même. »

languages.text: {n}Er steht von seinem Platz auf, kommt zu dir und nimmt dich in die Arme.{/n} "Manchmal schweige ich, damit ich niemanden verletze. Und wenn bestimmte Sachen ganz offensichtlich sind, schaffe ich es nicht, sie auch laut auszusprechen."
languages.original_text: {n}He rises from his seat and comes over to take you in his arms.{/n} "Sometimes I stay silent to avoid causing pain. When things are self-evident, but I can't bring myself to say them aloud."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er steht von seinem Platz auf, kommt zu dir und nimmt dich in die Arme.{/n} "Manchmal schweige ich, damit ich niemanden verletze. Und wenn bestimmte Sachen ganz offensichtlich sind, schaffe ich es nicht, sie auch laut auszusprechen."

languages.text: {n}Oturduğu yerden kalkarak seni kollarına almaya geliyor.{/n} "Bazen acıya neden olmaktan kaçınmak için sessiz kalırım. Her şey apaçık ortada olsa da onları yüksek sesle söylemeye dilim varmaz."
languages.original_text: {n}He rises from his seat and comes over to take you in his arms.{/n} "Sometimes I stay silent to avoid causing pain. When things are self-evident, but I can't bring myself to say them aloud."
